name: Guadalupe Bowl from Comme Ça
description: Though it can be presented in a bowl, this light, fresh punch from Comme Ça in Los Angeles works well served from a pitcher.
recipeIngredient: Garnish: Cucumber slices and black sea salt

recipeInstructions.text: In large bowl combine cilantro, sliced cucumber, quartered limes, and simple syrup. Muddle.
Pour into pitcher if desired, stir in tequila, and add ice.
Top with additional cucumber slices and sprinkle a pinch of black sea salt on top.
